text:
Overview of the Apple TV + service and its series. Have something to see?
01 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Artyom Bausov
Today officially launched the Apple TV + movie service with original TV shows and shows. Apple spent a lot of money on it.
It was interesting to learn how the company dealt with a new field.
We watched the news and are in a hurry to share our first impressions. In short: very good, a great start!
What gives an Apple TV + subscription



By subscribing to Apple TV +, you get access to the original series created by Apple from the largest studios with the participation of famous film and television professionals such as Oprah Winfrey, Steven Spielberg, Jennifer Aniston, Reese Witherspoon, Octavia Spencer, JJ Abrams, Jason Momoa, M. Knight Shyamalan, John M. Chu and many others.
These projects can only be viewed on Apple TV +.
All service content is available through a single subscription on all platforms: iOS, macOS and tvOS.
List of available series:
‚ñ™Ô∏è comedy drama series Morning show with Reese Witherspoon, Jennifer Aniston and Steve Karell‚ñ™Ô∏è science fiction series See with Jason MomoaaÔ∏è dramatic biography Dickinson with Haley Steinfeld and Anna Baryshnikova‚ñ™Ô∏è fantastic drama For the sake of all mankind with Jodal Dalf√∂lur and children‚Äôs program Helper SuppÔ∏è mystical series Epistles of the ghost Snoopy cartoon in space Space Ô∏è Hala drama with Gabriel Luna from the new Terminator series Ô∏è thriller series al House with a servant‚ñ™Ô∏è detective thriller In truth, with Octavia Spencer
How and where to watch TV shows



To start watching TV shows, you need to subscribe to the Apple TV + service. The first 7 days are free. Everyone who bought a new device after September 10, get free access for 1 year.
After the subscription, the cost will be 199 rubles. per month. As much as Apple Arcade. Students have free access.
You can watch all the shows and TV shows in the standard TV application. If you have a Windows computer, then on the Apple website.
Impressions
Brief impressions of the first episodes of new series.
Morning show



About what: about the problems of modern television.
A good drama about two television presenters of the morning show, one of whom was fired. We are shown the opposite side of television, where cruelty and cynicism reigns.
You can feel how Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon invested in this series. Captures from the first series and raises acutely social issues.
Who to watch: for lovers of intriguing stories and bright actors
See



About what: about survival in a feral blind society.
One of the few examples where Jason Momoa gave his best and literally got used to his role. An interesting presentation of the story of selected children who for the first time in 600 years learned to see, and society considers this to be God's punishment.
An abundance of beautiful landscapes, conspiracies and intricacies is attached. But not without a cliche, unfortunately.
To watch: lovers of social fiction
Dickinson



About what: about the problems of growing up.
The authors were able to create a truly black comedy about the problems of growing up, family and gender. Very much emphasis is placed on ‚Äúnon-standard‚Äù people and the reaction of society to them.
And although not modernity is shown to us, in reality a good allusion to our society has turned out.
To watch: lovers of unusual teenage TV shows
For the sake of all mankind



About: an alternative space race story
This series will fall in love with the Russian audience. From the first minutes we are shown an alternative story in which the USSR first landed on the moon, and the Americans lost, but do not stop giving up.
I liked the well-conveyed atmosphere of the 70s, good humor (of which there are not many) and the development of characters.
Who to watch: space lovers and the ‚Äúwhat if‚Äù theories
Ghost messages



About what: about children trying to solve the mystery of a ghost that revived literary heroes
The series is literally saturated with mysticism and riddles. The result was a partially detective movie for the whole family, not without stupidity.
Easy thriller about crime, punishment and ghosts. A bit chaotic, but sometimes funny and even intriguing.
To watch: fans of mysticism and detective stories

The list will still be updated.

Total. How is the service?
I can‚Äôt speak for everyone, but it seems to me that Apple has a great start. At least part of the series is definitely worth watching.
It works smoothly and without complaints. Pleasantly pleased with the availability of Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos technologies. They literally work on immersion and only enhance the effect of viewing.
Earlier, there were rumors that Apple TV + will only have family content without adult frills. This is not true. There are serials for adults with bloodthirsty and that's all, and there are a lot of them. They are marked with an 18+ icon.
In general, I have only positive impressions of the service. And so far from what I‚Äôve looked most liked Seeing with Jason Momoa. I highly recommend it.
